snippet.title: Halver ― Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1358440/Halver/

Halve the blocks into two equal parts and solve the unique puzzles in a game with blueprint visual style and meditative music

Twitter: https://twitter.com/GoloGamesStudio
Discord: https://discord.gg/9qqS9e2H
Mail: gologames@bk.ru
